assetProfile.address2: 10th Floor Off S. V. Road Near Goregaon Railway Station, Goregaon (West)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bhageria Industries Limited manufactures and sells dyes, dyes intermediates, and basic chemicals for dye manufacturers in India. The company operates through Chemical and Solar Power segments. It also engages in the generation of solar power and EPC contracts. The company also exports its products to Korea, Japan, Taiwan, China, Germany, the United States, and other European and African countries. The company was formerly known as Bhageria Dye Chem Limited and changed its name to Bhageria Industries Limited in August 2015. Bhageria Industries Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Mumbai, India.
